Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payment of excise tax for net share repurchases
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of secured debt
proceeds from issuance of senior long term debt
proceeds from long term lines of credit
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term capital lease obligations
repayments of long term lines of credit
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from collection of notes receivable
proceeds from equity method investment dividends or distributions return of capital
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from repayments of commercial paper

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other employee related liabilities
Depreciation and Amortization: depreciation and amortization on property and equipment
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain on settlement of acquired note receivable
write off of deferred debt issuance cost
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: amortization of financing costs and discounts
repayments of debt and capital lease obligations
